languages.text: {n}Арбитр, пристально осматривающий скульптора, хмурится и мешкает с ответом. Заметив, что вы смотрите на него, он угрюмо буркает:{/n} "Я бы предпочел, чтобы он точно соответствовал реальности". {n}Отведя глаза, он бурчит:{/n} "Не разбираюсь в этом вашем искусстве".

{n}Solomorne, who has been intently scrutinising the sculptor, frowns and hesitates to answer. Noticing your expectant gaze, he sullenly mutters,{/n} "I would want it to perfectly match reality." {n}Averting his eyes, he growls,{/n} "I don't know about this art of yours."
languages.original_text: {n}Арбитр, пристально осматривающий скульптора, хмурится и мешкает с ответом. Заметив, что вы смотрите на него, он угрюмо буркает:{/n} "Я бы предпочел, чтобы он точно соответствовал реальности". {n}Отведя глаза, он бурчит:{/n} "Не разбираюсь в этом вашем искусстве".

{n}Solomorne, who has been intently scrutinising the sculptor, frowns and hesitates to answer. Noticing your expectant gaze, he sullenly mutters,{/n} "I would want it to perfectly match reality." {n}Averting his eyes, he growls,{/n} "I don't know about this art of yours."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, der den Skulpteur genau beobachtet hat, runzelt die Stirn und zögert. Als er deinen erwartungsvollen Blick bemerkt, murmelt er verdrießlich:{/n} "Die Realität soll perfekt abgebildet sein." {n}Er wendet den Blick ab und knurrt:{/n} "Ich weiß nichts von Eurer Kunst."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne, who has been intently scrutinising the sculptor, frowns and hesitates to answer. Noticing your expectant gaze, he sullenly mutters,{/n} "I would want it to perfectly match reality." {n}Averting his eyes, he growls,{/n} "I don't know about this art of yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, der den Skulpteur genau beobachtet hat, runzelt die Stirn und zögert. Als er deinen erwartungsvollen Blick bemerkt, murmelt er verdrießlich:{/n} "Die Realität soll perfekt abgebildet sein." {n}Er wendet den Blick ab und knurrt:{/n} "Ich weiß nichts von Eurer Kunst."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, qui dévisage le sculpteur depuis le début, fronce les sourcils et hésite à répondre. En remarquant votre regard impatient, il marmonne sur un ton maussade :{/n} « Je voudrais que cette sculpture soit en tout point conforme à la réalité. Je ne connais rien à l'art, » {n}ajoute-t-il en détournant le regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne, who has been intently scrutinising the sculptor, frowns and hesitates to answer. Noticing your expectant gaze, he sullenly mutters,{/n} "I would want it to perfectly match reality." {n}Averting his eyes, he growls,{/n} "I don't know about this art of yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, qui dévisage le sculpteur depuis le début, fronce les sourcils et hésite à répondre. En remarquant votre regard impatient, il marmonne sur un ton maussade :{/n} « Je voudrais que cette sculpture soit en tout point conforme à la réalité. Je ne connais rien à l'art, » {n}ajoute-t-il en détournant le regard.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彫刻家をじっと観察していたソロモーンは、眉をひそめ、答えをためらった。あなたの期待に満ちた視線に気づき、彼はふてくされたようにぼそりとつぶやいた。{/n}「実物と完全に一致していてほしいです」{n}視線をそらしながら、彼は唸るように言った。{/n}「あなたがたの芸術が、私にはよくわかりません」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne, who has been intently scrutinising the sculptor, frowns and hesitates to answer. Noticing your expectant gaze, he sullenly mutters,{/n} "I would want it to perfectly match reality." {n}Averting his eyes, he growls,{/n} "I don't know about this art of yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}彫刻家をじっと観察していたソロモーンは、眉をひそめ、答えをためらった。あなたの期待に満ちた視線に気づき、彼はふてくされたようにぼそりとつぶやいた。{/n}「実物と完全に一致していてほしいです」{n}視線をそらしながら、彼は唸るように言った。{/n}「あなたがたの芸術が、私にはよくわかりません」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, que estudiaba atentamente al escultor, frunce el ceño y duda en responder. Al ver tu mirada expectante, murmura:{/n} «Preferiría una réplica exacta». {n}Aparta la vista y gruñe:{/n} «No entiendo mucho de arte».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne, who has been intently scrutinising the sculptor, frowns and hesitates to answer. Noticing your expectant gaze, he sullenly mutters,{/n} "I would want it to perfectly match reality." {n}Averting his eyes, he growls,{/n} "I don't know about this art of yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, que estudiaba atentamente al escultor, frunce el ceño y duda en responder. Al ver tu mirada expectante, murmura:{/n} «Preferiría una réplica exacta». {n}Aparta la vista y gruñe:{/n} «No entiendo mucho de arte».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙一直在仔细观察着眼前的雕刻师。听到你的话，他皱起眉头，不知该如何作答。随后，他注意到了你期待的目光，闷闷不乐地嘟囔了一句。{/n}“我希望能和实际一模一样。”{n}随后他移开视线，低声补充道。{/n}“我对艺术一窍不通。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne, who has been intently scrutinising the sculptor, frowns and hesitates to answer. Noticing your expectant gaze, he sullenly mutters,{/n} "I would want it to perfectly match reality." {n}Averting his eyes, he growls,{/n} "I don't know about this art of yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙一直在仔细观察着眼前的雕刻师。听到你的话，他皱起眉头，不知该如何作答。随后，他注意到了你期待的目光，闷闷不乐地嘟囔了一句。{/n}“我希望能和实际一模一样。”{n}随后他移开视线，低声补充道。{/n}“我对艺术一窍不通。”

languages.text: {n}Heykeltıraşı dikkatle inceleyen Solomorne, kaşlarını çatarak cevap vermekte tereddüt ediyor. Beklenti dolu bakışlarını fark edince somurtup güç bela yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Gerçeğin mükemmel bir kopyası olsun." {n}Bakışlarını kaçırıp homurdanıyor.{/n} "Ben bu sanat sepet işlerinden pek anlamam."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne, who has been intently scrutinising the sculptor, frowns and hesitates to answer. Noticing your expectant gaze, he sullenly mutters,{/n} "I would want it to perfectly match reality." {n}Averting his eyes, he growls,{/n} "I don't know about this art of yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heykeltıraşı dikkatle inceleyen Solomorne, kaşlarını çatarak cevap vermekte tereddüt ediyor. Beklenti dolu bakışlarını fark edince somurtup güçbela yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Gerçeğin mükemmel bir kopyası olsun." {n}Bakışlarını kaçırıp homurdanıyor.{/n} "Ben bu sizin sanat işlerinden pek anlamıyorum."
